EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm_Event_Pivotal@NYSE_Q413.Totte Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: You're Invited: an Exclusive Pivotal - NYSE Event Oct 28
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
I'd like to invite you to the Pivotal NYSE event <http://gopivotal.com/nyse> being held on Monday, October 28 from 6-9PM at the iconic New York Stock Exchange. Pivotal and NYSE Euronext are uniting to drive innovation and productivity in the world of Hadoop and Big Data. Key NYSE Euronext and Pivotal executives will be on hand to host this casual gathering and answer questions. Let’s celebrate! Join me for drinks and hors d'oeuvres to help kick off this historic technology partnership. Register Now <http://gopivotal.com/nyse>.
I hope I will see you there, Jim Totte Director, Business Development jtotte@gopivotal.com <mailto:jtotte@gopivotal.com> (650) 245-6851
Check out Pivotal P.O.V. Visit Our Blog >> <http://blog.gopivotal.com/>
What's New at Pivotal? Read Now >> <http://www.gopivotal.com/resources>
Follow Us: Twitter <http://www.twitter.com/gopivotal> | LinkedIn <http://www.linkedin.com/company/gopivotal> | Facebook <http://www.facebook.com/gopivotal> | Google+ <https://plus.google.com/105320112436428794490>
